name: Mushie
description:
Mushie is a classic side-scrolling platformer in the vein of Super Mario - except in this case, you don't eat the mushrooms - you must protect and guide them!

Sent by the Gods of Wisdom, players take control of the young Acolyte Elin as they move throw musty ruins looking for the all-powerful Mushie.

Players will navigate challenging puzzles to push and toss Mushies to the goal in order to win the favor of the Gods.

CONTROLS Keyboard
  • Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space Bar
  • Pickup/Drop Mushie: E key
  • Throw Mushie: F key
Controller
  • Move: Left analog stick
  • Jump: A button/Cross button
  • Pickup/Drop Mushie: B button/Circle button
  • Throw Mushie: X button/Square button

Built for Ludum Dare 46 in Unity using Photoshop CC, FL Studio 20, and BFXR. First serious attempt at a 2D game in Unity for Ludum Dare - hope you enjoy and have fun!
